Services

Currently designing and developing various corporate identity sites, web 2.0 applications and graphical designs for corporations, individuals, and even an internationally award winning band. Dwight's specialty is agile web development, internet marketing, conceptual digital art, corporate branding and site graphics. Dwight's design style is influenced by various realms from pop culture, anime, and also from technology and the web itself.
